document_data.name: Reduce Animal
document_data.mainbody: '''''Reduce animal''''' was a [[transmutation]] spell used by [[druid]]s and [[ranger]]s to shrink one animal to half its size. The animal had to acquiesce for the transformation to work.
document_data.Components: This spell required verbal and somatic components only.
document_data.Related spell: The reversed form of the more powerful spell ''[[animal growth]]'', ''shrink animal'', was sometimes also called ''reduce animal'', but was in fact a different spell.<ref><ref><ref>
